ygData.subject: Re: Tusk quest suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, this may be of some bad news to you.  The only other elephants i am aware of in the game are in the frozen plains of Everfrost.  The Wooly Mammoth.
ygData.messageBody:
Well, this may be of some bad news to you. The only other elephants i am
aware of in the game are in the frozen plains of Everfrost. The Wooly
Mammoth. Anyone know what they drop besides big stinkies?

Xillith (two L's) heh
Rallos Zek


>From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Tusk quest suggestion
>Date: Wed, 11 Aug 1999 09:48:04 -0500
>
>From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>
>
>
> > Now, I'm just a newbie Shadowknight (Zaer, Level 4 on Veeshan), but
> > doesn't the quest say to get a "Bull Elephant Tusk"?
> >
> > Shouldn't you be hunting "Bull Elephants"?
> >
> > Just my 2cp worth.
> >
> > Zaer, Veeshan
>
>I have only received small mammoth tusks from the Bull Elephants
>in S Karana, and people who spend much more time there than I have
>only seen the small mammoth tusks from the Bull Elephants as well.
>Noone I've talked to has ever seen an item called "bull elephant tusk"
>
>Xilith
>Tunare
